definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: Don't worry. The next section will show how to add displayable content.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，下一节将说明如何添加可显示的内容。

sentences.english: Calm down, please tell me your address in detail.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，请告诉我们您的具体地址。

sentences.english: Don't worry about it. It seems to me that you always do better than you say.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，在我看来每次你的考试结果都比你说的要好。

sentences.english: No hurry!I can run you along in the car.
sentences.chinese: 别着急!我可以开车送你去。

sentences.english: B:Take it easy.I take two bottles of puritied water.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，我带了两瓶纯净水。

sentences.english: Don't worry. Just hear me out.
Grass doesn't need to be cut. calm down.
sentences.chinese: 草还不用着那快剪吧，别着急。

sentences.english: Don't worry. Time will soon ripen.
Don't worry, I'm from tech support.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，我来自技术支持部门。

sentences.english: Don't worry. I'll get better soon.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，我会很快好起来的。

sentences.english: Dont worry! Mate, once he get here, Bob's your uncle.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，伙计，等他来了就万事大吉了。

sentences.english: He tells himself not to worry.
Don't worry, we will offer you a single-journey ticket for free.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，我们会给您提供一张免费的单程票。

sentences.english: Don’t worry, everything will be attended to in good time!
sentences.chinese: 别着急，每件事都会得到及时处理。

definition: (modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
erhua variant of 等一會|等一会[deng3 yi1 hui4]
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
